value.title: StarCraft 2: 8 Grandmaster Free-For-All!
value.excerpt: 8 Grandmaster StarCraft 2 players enter, only 1 leaves. This game starts and ends with some ridiculous gameplay. The mid-late game however... is a very slow. value.excerpt: AlphaStar has been playing on the StarCraft 2 ladder over the last few months. value.title: StarCraft 2: Dark's OVERWHELMING Aggression... Backfires!
